title: The best ever Great British Bake Off recipes: our definitive guide
text:
Series ten of the Great British Bake Off has certainly ruffled feathers for its seemingly impossible technicals, double-dumpings, and harsh criticisms from judges Paul Hollywood and Prue Leith, despite a peppering of light-hearted jokes from presenters Noel Fielding and Sandi Toksvig throughout.

However, aside from the controversies, the contestants, who are younger than previous years (with an average age of 31 – perhaps to appeal to the show's growing millennial fanbase) – have, in true Bake Off style, supported and lifted one another whether icing a cake or sharing a freezer, producing culinary masterpieces in the process.

To celebrate its grand finale tonight, here we share recipes for...
description: Series ten of the Great British Bake Off has certainly ruffled feathers for its seemingly impossible technicals, double-dumpings, and harsh criticisms from judges Paul Hollywood and Prue Leith, despite a peppering of light-hearted jokes from presenters Noel Fielding and Sandi Toksvig throughout.
